name: Tactical penguin
description:
Help the penguins not to starve!

This game is inspired to the classic Missile Command gameplay and we made it for the Ice cream Jam hosted by MyAppFree

Defend your fish from the pelicans, the penguins will starve if there are not at least 5 fish.

When the missile is armed by penguins, simply click to aim at pelicans, but be careful to blizzard and the wind that affects the flight path.

have fun!
